statements: SELECT * FROM route_planning;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM route_planning;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, estimated_time FROM route_planning WHERE traffic_condition = 'heavy';
SELECT vehicle_id, start_location, end_location, estimated_time FROM route_planning WHERE traffic_condition = 'moderate';
SELECT * FROM route_planning ORDER BY estimated_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM route_planning WHERE traffic_condition = 'heavy';
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM route_planning WHERE estimated_time > 3.5 ORDER BY estimated_time DESC;
SELECT route_name, end_location FROM route_planning WHERE traffic_condition = 'moderate' AND estimated_time BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, start_location, end_location FROM route_planning WHERE traffic_condition = 'light' AND start_location != end_location;
SELECT route_name, traffic_condition, estimated_time FROM route_planning WHERE traffic_condition = 'light' OR traffic_condition = 'heavy' ORDER BY estimated_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM delivery_routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, traffic_condition FROM delivery_routes WHERE traffic_condition = 'Heavy traffic';
SELECT * FROM traffic_updates WHERE traffic_status = 'Accident' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location, timestamp FROM delivery_routes INNER JOIN traffic_updates ON delivery_routes.route_id = traffic_updates.route_id WHERE traffic_status = 'Moderate traffic';
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM delivery_routes WHERE traffic_condition='Heavy Traffic';
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location, end_location, traffic_condition FROM delivery_routes WHERE traffic_condition='Moderate Traffic' ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM delivery_routes WHERE start_location='City A' OR end_location='City B';
SELECT dr.route_name, tu.timestamp, tu.traffic_status FROM delivery_routes dr JOIN traffic_updates tu ON dr.route_id = tu.route_id WHERE tu.timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location, end_location FROM delivery_routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_id, route_name, traffic_conditions FROM delivery_routes ORDER BY traffic_conditions DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_details WHERE vehicle_type = 'Truck';
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, current_location, next_destination FROM vehicle_details WHERE current_location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM delivery_routes ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT route_name, traffic_conditions FROM delivery_routes WHERE traffic_conditions='Heavy Traffic';
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, current_location FROM vehicle_details WHERE current_location='Warehouse A';
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location, timestamp, traffic_info FROM delivery_routes JOIN traffic_updates ON delivery_routes.route_id = traffic_updates.route_id ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Route;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM Route WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, traffic_conditions FROM Route WHERE traffic_conditions = 'Heavy';
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance, traffic_conditions FROM Route WHERE start_location LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance, traffic_conditions FROM Route WHERE end_location = 'City Center' ORDER BY traffic_conditions ASC;
SELECT * FROM Route WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance FROM Route WHERE end_location = 'City A' ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM Route WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY route_id ASC;
SELECT traffic_id, timestamp, speed, congestion_level FROM TrafficData WHERE speed > 50 AND congestion_level = 'High';
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_time, delivery_status FROM Delivery WHERE delivery_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY delivery_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM routes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_conditions WHERE road_closure = TRUE;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM routes WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_type, driver_name FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV';
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE start_location = 'City A';
SELECT vehicle_name, driver_name FROM vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_type, vehicle_name;
SELECT * FROM assignments JOIN vehicles ON assignments.vehicle_id = vehicles.vehicle_id WHERE assignment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';

SELECT assignments.assignment_id, routes.start_location, routes.end_location, efficiency_data.traffic_time FROM assignments JOIN routes ON assignments.route_id = routes.route_id JOIN efficiency_data ON assignments.route_id = efficiency_data.route_id;
